nodes.text: This scout was a male Human Mandalorian, and a member of the New Mandalorians' police force during the Clone Wars.

Around 22 BBY, he was given the task of spying on a Death Watch base on Concordia. The police scout returned to Mandalore to report his findings to Prime Minister Almec in the New Mandalorian capital city of Sundari.
The police scout was voiced by actor Matt Lanter.
